member.name: VisualElement
member.summary: Represents a XAML element in the Live Visual Tree in Microsoft Visual Studio.

member.name: VisualElement.SrcInfo
member.summary: Information about the XAML source document.

member.name: VisualElement.Name
member.summary: The name of the XAML element, if it has an x:Name defined in markup.

member.name: VisualElement.NumChildren
member.summary: The number of children the XAML element has.
